Detailed Description

Class used for executing queries to a database.

This class is only instansiated with CharEncSQLConn::newQuery.

Converts query and result texts between the character encoding systems supplied converted between by the CharEncoding objects supplied in the constructor.

MC2String CharEncSQLQuery::getEncColumn (  int  colIndex  ) 
 

Get a column from the current row.

The result is converted using the charEncoder set in the constructor.

Parameters:

Returns:

bool CharEncSQLQuery::prepare (  const char *  query  )  [virtual]
 

Initiate the query with the query text and prepare it for use.

Call execute to make it possible to get the result.

When this method is called, any old result strings are deallocated.

Parameters:
query The query text.

Reimplemented from SQLQuery.

const CharEncoding* CharEncSQLQuery::m_charEncoder [protected]
 

Char encoding object used for converting text from the database.

Can be NULL if the constructing connection did not find any reason for conversion.
